body:
Can we do something where we force fields to run `value.trim()` versus making it a validation error? I'm thinking there are a few spots we could `trim` - on input blur, on value change, technically could be done during validation, etc.

If users are copy-pasting values which leads to this whitespace issue, we should support that process entirely, not add a hurdle for users to overcome when trying to work quickly.

I'm open to suggestions from the rest of the team though.
